data.text:
CTech is a technology news site providing an international readership with real-time, high-impact stories from the Israeli tech scene. Combining the investigative know-how of a team of international reporters with the deep on-ground access of Israel's leading business newspaper Calcalist, we bring to the table a novel viewpoint that highlights the cross-border nature of tech news coming from this hotbed of innovation. With a mix of breaking news and in-depth stories, we cater to industry executives, investors, and technology enthusiasts alike. Whether our readers come to sniff out business opportunities or to find engaging stories, CTech provides them with local insight and a global perspective. CTech dives into the hottest topics including cybersecurity, autonomous driving, artificial intelligence, cryptocurrency, 3D-printing and homeland security. Founded in the summer of 2017, CTech is led by Publisher Yoel Esteron, the founder of Calcalist.

Website

https://www.calcalistech.com
